translation.en: [emcee] Thank you all for coming to the WCA World Championships, 2019!
translation.zh:
‎欢迎来到2019年
‎世界魔方协会世界锦标赛！

translation.en: [boy] Yes!
[interviewer] Who do you think will win the world championships today?
translation.zh: ‎你认为谁能赢得今天的世界锦标赛？

translation.en: Well, it's pretty tough competition.
My bet is on Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.zh: ‎我赌菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯获胜

translation.en: Feliks Zemdegs.
Pretty much one of the greatest cubers of all time.
translation.zh: ‎世上最伟大的魔方选手之一

translation.en: I really want Feliks to win again.
translation.zh: ‎我很想看到菲利克斯再次夺冠

translation.en: [announcer] From Australia, Feliks Zemdegs!
translation.zh:
‎来自澳大利亚的
‎菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯！

translation.en: I personally think Max Park will win,
translation.zh: ‎我个人认为马克斯·帕克会赢

translation.en: because he's the most consistent cuber here.
translation.zh: ‎因为他是表现最稳定的选手

translation.en: I'd probably say Max Park.
-Max Park. -Max Park will be world champion.
translation.zh:
‎-马克斯·帕克
‎-马克斯·帕克将夺得世界冠军

translation.en: [emcee] From the United States of America, Max Park!
I can't really decide between them.
They're very, like, close, so it's definitely gonna be exciting.
translation.zh:
‎他们俩难分高下
‎所以比赛一定会很精彩

translation.en: [man] I think at the start,
my parents thought it was just like a phase I was going through,
just like some random hobby that I picked up and might get rid of.
translation.zh:
‎玩魔方只是一时的爱好
‎很快就会玩腻了

translation.en: But after the first time I solved it, like...
translation.zh: ‎但是当我第一次解开魔方时 感觉…

translation.en: I just wanted to get faster and faster. It was just so addictive.
translation.zh:
‎我只想不断提高速度
‎魔方太让人着迷了

translation.en: I just never got bored of it.
[woman] It probably took me a little while to realize and understand how good he was.
translation.zh:
‎我过了一段时间才发现和明白
‎他多么擅长这个

translation.en: [young Feliks] 22.78.
He's got a serious addiction as well. Obsession.
But also an amazing talent.
He used to walk around the house and dinner time
translation.zh:
‎他经常在家里走来走去
‎到了吃饭时间

translation.en: we would sometimes just say, "Put the cube away."
translation.zh: ‎我们有时会说：“把魔方收起来”

translation.en: [young Feliks] Ah, 16.92.
[Rita] But he was just doing better and better all the time,
and then all of a sudden setting world records,
and then media coming, and it was just a crazy, crazy ride.
translation.zh:
‎跟着媒体蜂拥而至
‎真是让人难以置信

translation.en: It is 22 past 7 now.
Well, our next guest can solve a Rubik's Cube puzzle
translation.zh: ‎我们的下一位嘉宾能在不到10秒内

translation.en: in under 10 seconds, and he's only 13 years old.
translation.zh: ‎解开一个魔方 而且他只有13岁

translation.en: [reporter] Fourteen-year-old Feliks Zemdegs broke two world records by a second.
translation.zh:
‎14岁的菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯
‎以一秒之差打破了两项世界纪录

translation.en: -[reporter] What's your secret? -Practice.
Please welcome Feliks Zemdegs. Come on, Feliks!
translation.zh:
‎有请菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯
‎来吧 菲利克斯！

translation.en: [man] We as parents ended up becoming media managers, which was totally foreign to us.
translation.zh:
‎作为父母 我们成了他的媒体经理
‎这方面我们完全是外行

translation.en: We didn't know how to do all of this stuff,
how to manage the radio interviews and the television interviews.
translation.zh: ‎不懂如何应付电台采访和电视采访

translation.en: When he first broke the single world record,
translation.zh: ‎当他首次打破单次世界纪录时

translation.en: that sort of put him on the world stage, I guess.
That world record at the time was 7.08 seconds, and Feliks got 7.03 seconds.
translation.zh:
‎当时的世界纪录是7.08秒
‎菲利克斯的成绩是7.03秒

translation.en: [Feliks] Yeah!
[spectator] Come on! Get sub-five!
-[Feliks] Okay. -[spectator] Four-point-two! Whoa! That's a world record!
He set so many world records that I have totally lost track.
translation.zh:
‎他创造了太多的世界纪录
‎多到我都数不清了

translation.en: [Feliks] I won the world championship in 2013.
And then 2015 going to finals I just had a lot of confidence,
translation.zh: ‎2015年我进了决赛 我自信满满

translation.en: and so I managed to win that one, like, comfortably.
So, by the time it got to the world championships in 2017,
translation.zh: ‎所以2017年参加世界锦标赛的时候

translation.en: the question was, can anyone actually, like, beat me?
translation.zh: ‎问题变成了 真的有人能战胜我吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I remember very specifically when I first became aware of Max.
translation.zh:
‎对 我清楚记得
‎我第一次听说马克斯的情形

translation.en: There was this video that was going around of this kid doing, like, a 4x4 one-handed
translation.zh:
‎当时流传着一段视频
‎是一个孩子单手玩4x4魔方

translation.en: in 40 seconds or something like that.
And I spent, like, two hours trying to beat this time.
translation.zh: ‎我花了两个小时 想做到比他更快

translation.en: I was like, "What is happening here?
I can't beat this random kid on YouTube who does a 4x4 with one hand."
translation.zh:
‎我无法战胜油管上
‎这个单手玩4x4魔方的孩子”

translation.en: That very much caught my attention.
I'd heard about, like, I guess, the way Max was
from a couple of people who went to the US Nationals 2016.
translation.zh:
‎在2016年的全美锦标赛上
‎听几个人说起过

translation.en: But he was kind of a bit of a mystery to me.
And then, like, middle of 2017, he got the 3x3 average world record.
translation.zh:
‎然后2017年年中的时候
‎他打破了3x3平均世界纪录

translation.en: Later on that year, in Paris, Max won the world championships.
translation.zh:
‎然后那一年在巴黎
‎马克斯赢了世界锦标赛

translation.en: And that was his big moment of, "Okay, Max Park is here."
translation.zh:
‎这让他一战成名
‎“看啊 马克斯·帕克来了”

translation.en: He's really, really good.
Even though we were friendly, it was a little bit hard
translation.zh:
‎虽然当时我们很友好
‎但我心里还是有点不是滋味

translation.en: when it would be like every two or three weeks
Max would just beat one of my records.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯就会打破一项我创造的纪录

translation.en: That was kind of annoying to deal with.
-[boy] What? -Minute 30.
Got it.
-Yeah! -[spectator] Oh, my god.
I still am hanging on to the 3x3 average world record.
translation.zh: ‎我仍然保持着3x3平均世界纪录

translation.en: Yes!
[Feliks] I know he still, like, very, very much wants that back.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 他很想夺回这项纪录

translation.en: But that's probably, like, one of the things I'm the most proud of.
translation.zh:
‎不过 这可能是我
‎最引以为傲的纪录之一

translation.en: [man] The first thing people probably wanna know about speedcubing
translation.zh: ‎说到速解魔方 人们首先想知道的

translation.en: is how do you solve the cube?
When you're learning how to solve a cube,
translation.zh: ‎（右 上2 右' 上 右 上' 右'） ‎刚开始学习解魔方时

translation.en: you generally learn a set of algorithms:
move sequences that move certain pieces to other places,
translation.zh:
‎也就是将特定方块移动到其他位置的
‎一套移动序列

translation.en: building up layer by layer to eventually solve the cube.
translation.zh: ‎一层一层的叠加 直到最终解开魔方

translation.en: Most serious speedcubers learn around 300 algorithms
translation.zh:
‎认真的速解魔方选手
‎大都通过无数个小时的练习

translation.en: through countless hours of practice.
I think what really sets the top speedcubers apart from the rest
translation.zh: ‎我认为顶尖高手与一般人的区别在于

translation.en: is their ability to have very quick pattern recognition,
translation.zh: ‎他们能够迅速识别魔方的模式

translation.en: to memorize and synthesize hundreds of algorithms
translation.zh: ‎能够记住并综合数百种算法

translation.en: and to put all those into their muscle memory,
translation.zh: ‎并将这一切转化为肌肉记忆

translation.en: to keep this all as seamless as possible.
No starting and stopping.
The undisputed main event is definitely the 3x3 event,
translation.zh: ‎毫无疑问 3x3比赛是最重要的赛事

translation.en: and that's the one that everybody wants to win.
[Kit] And these days, you can't talk about winning any event
translation.zh: ‎现在 一说到在任何赛事上获胜

translation.en: without mentioning Max Park.
I want to get three second! Come on!
translation.zh: ‎我想要三秒钟解开 快点！

translation.en: Feliks doesn't react when he got four because he's the world record holder.
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯四秒钟解开也无所谓
‎因为他是世界纪录保持者

translation.en: [man] As a baby, as soon as we brought him home from the hospital,
translation.zh:
‎他出生的时候
‎我们刚把他从医院抱回家

translation.en: I felt something was a little off.
We took him to the pediatrician. We had his hearing checked.
translation.zh:
‎我们带他去看小儿科
‎给他做了听力检查

translation.en: He was just hyper-focused on whatever he was doing.
translation.zh: ‎他不管做什么都是全神贯注

translation.en: And once we got his attention, he wasn't very interested
translation.zh:
‎当我们让他注意到我们时
‎不管我们给他什么

translation.en: in anything that we had to offer.
[woman] It was just kinda like, "He's gonna get better.
translation.zh: ‎我当时认为 “会慢慢好起来的”

translation.en: Okay, like, by the time he's gonna be three, he's going to be fine."
translation.zh: ‎“等他长到三岁 就会没事了”

translation.en: It was my kinda big goal and hope and, you know, belief.
translation.zh:
‎这就是我当时的宏伟目标和希望
‎我的信念

translation.en: [Max] Dang you, Feliks!
Look.
[Schwan] We took him to the hospital, where we met with a child neurophysician,
translation.zh:
‎我们送他去医院
‎见到了一位小儿神经科医生

translation.en: and he, at that time, formally diagnosed Max with autism.
translation.zh: ‎他正式确诊马克斯患有自闭症

translation.en: [Miki] First thing I was thinking is...
I don't know, it's just a...
you kinda lost your... future, kind of thing.
translation.zh: ‎你失去了你的… ‎未来 可以这样说

translation.en: You had a beautiful...
"I'm going to do this with my child and do this and that."
translation.zh: ‎“我要和我的孩子一起做这个 做那个

translation.en: And then, it's just kinda like, shut the door in front of you.
translation.zh: ‎然后好像你面前的门被关上了

translation.en: [Schwan] I remember we were sitting at the edge of our bed,
and we were just hugging each other, and we just both lost it.
translation.zh: ‎拥抱对方 两个人都情绪崩溃了

translation.en: We were just crying, and I think...
to me it felt like, "Let's cry our hearts out now and get to work."
translation.zh:
‎我的感觉是
‎“让我们哭个痛快 然后去上班”

translation.en: [Miki] Hey Max, are you tired?
From that point on is when we started to look for answers.
translation.zh: ‎从那时起 我们开始寻找答案

translation.en: [Miki] I kinda knew that there is a reason why this is in my life
translation.zh:
‎我隐约觉得 我会遇到这种事
‎我会有这样的孩子

translation.en: and this is my child.
And I cannot just...
give up.
One day I just sat down and I was just kinda devastated.
translation.zh: ‎有一天我坐在那里 感觉万念俱灰

translation.en: He doesn't look at me, he doesn't play with me.
He is in his own world by himself.
[Miki] So I just did it together.
He lay down, I'd lay down.
He did this, I'd do this, and then just kinda...
translation.zh: ‎他做什么 我就做什么 反正就是…

translation.en: not asking him anything.
"I'm here.
But, you know, when you're ready, I'm here with you."
translation.zh: ‎不过你知道 “等你准备好了 ‎我会在这里陪着你”

translation.en: And then one day we were playing with this phone. "Hello, hello."
translation.zh:
‎然后有一天我和他玩电话游戏
‎“喂 喂”

translation.en: -[Max] Hello? -[Miki] Hello?
And he was holding my hand, and then he was looking at Daddy.
translation.zh: ‎他牵着我的手 然后看着爸爸

translation.en: It was kinda like, "Daddy you're not invited."
translation.zh: ‎似乎在说：“爸爸 我们不欢迎你”

translation.en: Zip down.
That's a breakthrough thing.
So he started to open up his world.
[Schwan] I think that was sorta like the first time
that Miki started to enjoy her child as a child.
translation.zh: ‎享受儿子的陪伴 像孩子一样的陪伴

translation.en: [Schwan] It lit sort of like a fire within us to want more.
translation.zh: ‎这激励着我们想要更进一步

translation.en: How can we get more of this?
As a child, Max could not do anything with his fingers.
translation.zh: ‎儿时的马克斯无法用手指做任何事

translation.en: His fine motor skill was really stunted.
translation.zh: ‎他的精细运动能力发育得非常迟缓

translation.en: So we did tons of therapy working on his fingers.
translation.zh:
‎于是我们对他的手指
‎进行了大量针对性治疗

translation.en: We had a Rubik's Cube in the house, and so he just wanted to solve.
translation.zh: ‎当时家里有一个魔方 他想解开它

translation.en: I thought, "Why not?"
[Schwan] He just gravitated towards it.
Miki right away went on YouTube,
and figured out how to solve it, and then taught Max.
translation.zh:
‎找到了解魔方的方法
‎然后教给马克斯

translation.en: So she had two agendas in mind.
Here was something that I can use as a teaching component,
translation.zh: ‎首先 她可以利用魔方来训练孩子

translation.en: but, at the same time, he loves it
and... it would be a great thing for them to connect together,
not knowing at that time that he was just gonna rapid-fire down this rabbit hole.
translation.zh: ‎当时完全没想到他会一发而不可收拾

translation.en: -[Miki] What is it? -Thirty-one seconds.
[Miki] Okay!
[Schwan] The very first competition he went to, it was just an exercise
translation.zh: ‎他第一次参加比赛 其实是一项训练

translation.en: in me and Miki bringing him to a social event
translation.zh: ‎我和米基希望带他参加社交活动

translation.en: where he was gonna learn to stand in line,
look at somebody else for a cue to start cubing.
translation.zh: ‎学习看别人的提示 然后开始解魔方

translation.en: Wait your turn, wait till somebody says it's okay.
translation.zh: ‎学习等待 直到有人叫他开始

translation.en: It was a giant play date situation
that we were going to exploit for Max's social development.
translation.zh:
‎我们希望利用这次活动
‎培养马克斯的社交能力

translation.en: So we went there and I was surprised, because this pointing--
translation.zh:
‎到了活动现场 我感到很惊讶
‎因为他用手指人…

translation.en: We tried everything to teach him pointing.
translation.zh: ‎为了教他用手指人 我们用尽了办法

translation.en: Pointing is something that is a hallmark for autistic kids to not have.
translation.zh:
‎不会用手指人
‎是自闭症儿童的典型特征

translation.en: When he went to the competition,
we remember he was pointing at people and saying,
translation.zh: ‎我们记得他用手指着别人说

translation.en: "Here's this person." You know, all these people.
translation.zh: ‎“是这个人” 你知道 见人就指

translation.en: [Max] 9.15. He got sub-10.
[Schwan] We were like, huh? He's pointing, and this is coming out naturally.
translation.zh:
‎我们颇感意外
‎他会用手指人了 而且是自发的行为

translation.en: That was when we realized, "Wow, this is... this is great."
translation.zh:
‎当时我们就觉得
‎“哇 这真是…真是太棒了”

translation.en: Max's first award came
at the very second competition he ever went to.
translation.zh: ‎是在他第二次参加比赛的时候

translation.en: [announcer] In first place, we have Max Park.
[Schwan] That's when it dawned on us. "Wow, I think he has something."
translation.zh: ‎那时我们才开始明白 “哇 他有天赋”

translation.en: I remember thinking, "If he's really good at this
translation.zh:
‎我当时的想法是
‎“如果他真的擅长玩魔方

translation.en: and this is something that he loves to do,
we are going to run with this."
Yeah!
Yes!
Yeah!
[Schwan] 2017 Worlds was the first time
that Max competed against his idol, Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.zh:
‎是马克斯第一次和他的偶像
‎菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯同场较量

translation.en: He ended up winning 3x3 at Worlds that year, which was a really big deal.
translation.zh:
‎他赢得了那届锦标赛的3x3冠军
‎非常了不起

translation.en: But the big win for us was when he was up on the podium.
translation.zh:
‎但对于我们来说
‎最大的胜利是他站上领奖台时

translation.en: He looked at the way he was holding his prize and his shingle
and he looked at the podium next to him
and he immediately readjusted himself to be like the person next to them.
translation.zh:
‎然后立刻调整自己
‎让自己和旁边的人一样

translation.en: Me and Miki, we looked at each other and were like, "Did you see that?"
translation.zh:
‎我和米基对视了一眼说：
‎“看到了吗？”

translation.en: Because for us, an autistic kid looking at his peer and mimicking
translation.zh:
‎对我们来说 患有自闭症的孩子
‎能够摹仿他的对手

translation.en: is like the ultimate goal.
[whispering] I heart you.
You too.
[Schwan] Obviously, when you look at Max, he's a 17-year-old kid.
translation.zh: ‎显然 看麦克斯的样子 ‎他是个17岁的孩子 身高182厘米

translation.en: He's six foot tall.
translation.zh: ‎他是个17岁的孩子 身高182厘米

translation.en: But emotionally, he's about, I would say, seven, eight, maybe nine.
translation.zh:
‎但他控制情绪的能力
‎只有七八岁 也许九岁

translation.en: And so going into these competitions,
we were just concerned about his ability to deal with failure.
Okay, ready? Let's go.
[woman] Yeah, no problem.
Ready.
Max, a few weeks back, had somebody else in North America get a really good time,
translation.zh:
‎几周前 北美有个人
‎取得了很好的成绩

translation.en: and he... he had really high expectations of beating that.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯非常期待打破这个成绩

translation.en: Bam! Let's go!
[man] Max! Kill 'em!
[man] All right, that concludes the first half of the day.
translation.zh: ‎好 今天的上半场比赛结束了

translation.en: We're ending a little bit early.
[Schwan] And then it just didn't happen, and when that happened he just--
translation.zh: ‎结果他没能如愿 成绩出来后 他…

translation.en: He was very, very disappointed.
Because the luck happened!
[Schwan] In the meantime, we're holding back our own heartache,
translation.zh: ‎与此同时 我们强忍着伤心

translation.en: because regardless of if it was warranted or not,
it still kills us.
We have the window of hope still open for his emotional skills developing.
translation.zh:
‎我们对于他培养健全的情绪控制能力
‎仍然抱有希望

translation.en: -[beep] -[man] Okay. Okay.
translation.zh:
‎（2018年西海岸魔方巡回赛宣传片
‎第一次拍摄）

translation.en: Now, in order to win the giveaway,
you'll need to be at one of the West Coast competitions.
translation.zh: ‎你必须参加其中一场西海岸比赛

translation.en: So make sure you include in your comment
which competition you'll be attending, right, Max?
translation.zh: ‎你将参加那一场比赛 对吧 马克斯？

translation.en: Right, Feliks?
-[woman] "Right, Feliks." -Right.
[man] No, go, "Right, Feliks!"
translation.zh: ‎不对 要说“对 菲利克斯！”

translation.en: -Right, Feliks. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh:
‎-对 菲利克斯
‎-对 这就对了

translation.en: [man] Okay. Ready? One more time.
translation.zh: ‎好 准备好了吗？再来一次

translation.en: All right, one more time, Max. One more time.
translation.zh: ‎好 再来一次 马克斯 ‎再来一次

translation.en: [Schwan] The first time that we ever saw Feliks
was when we went to the 2013 World Championships in Las Vegas.
translation.zh:
‎是在拉斯维加斯举办的
‎2013年世界锦标赛上

translation.en: Feliks was the first person that Max ever asked for an autograph,
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯是马克斯
‎第一次讨要签名的对象

translation.en: and he was the very first person he ever took a picture with.
translation.zh: ‎也是马克斯第一次讨要合影的对象

translation.en: He just had this mythical, legendary status.
So four years later now, Max is bigger than Feliks.
translation.zh:
‎四年后的今天
‎马克斯的名气超过了菲利克斯

translation.en: And, you know, it was really... yeah, it was awkward.
After he broke the 3x3 world record average,
I, like, messaged his Facebook account.
I was just like, "Congratulations, you guys.
Really well done. You should be really proud."
translation.zh: ‎干得漂亮 你应该深感自豪”

translation.en: And then... yeah, met him for the first time at the Championships,
translation.zh: ‎然后…在锦标赛上第一次跟他见面

translation.en: and he was very, very excited.
[Schwan] Max and Feliks, they're cut from the same cloth.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯和菲利克斯非常相像

translation.en: They push each other...
but I think they also understand each other.
[Max] 4x4 top three, right?
-[Feliks] Top three, that's us. -[Max] In the world, right?
translation.zh:
‎-前三名 就是我们
‎-世界前三名 对吧？

translation.en: -[Max] Get 17, okay? -[Feliks] You're first, right?
translation.zh: ‎争取17秒 好吗？ ‎你是第一名 好吗？

translation.en: [Max] Okay, ready. Go!
Come on.
[spectators] Feliks got it.
[man] One more.
-One more time? -Yeah.
[Feliks] What do you wanna sing, Max?
"Bohemian Rhapsody"? That's so hard.
-Yeah. -Let's do it!
[Rita] Clearly, they're rivals,
but they're friends,
and it's just beautiful to watch Max looking up to Feliks in a way.
translation.zh:
‎看见马克斯崇拜菲利克斯的样子
‎感觉很美好

translation.en: Anything Feliks does, Max will do.
translation.zh:
‎不管菲利克斯做什么
‎马克斯都要照着做

translation.en: You gotta brush your teeth every night before you go to sleep and after dinner, because Feliks does it.
translation.zh:
‎每晚睡前和饭后要刷牙
‎因为菲利克斯是这样做的

translation.en: -Right, Max? -Right.
[Schwan] Every time Max does really well or breaks a record,
translation.zh: ‎每次马克斯取得好成绩或者打破纪录

translation.en: we get a text from Feliks and he says,
translation.zh: ‎我们都会收到菲利克斯的短信

translation.en: "Tell Max I'm so happy for him and congratulations."
translation.zh:
‎“告诉马克斯我替他感到高兴
‎祝贺他”

translation.en: And I'm sure that it doesn't feel good,
translation.zh: ‎我相信其实他心里并不好受

translation.en: especially if it's his record or something that Max breaks.
translation.zh:
‎尤其是马克斯打破的
‎是他的纪录的时候

translation.en: Nice one. Good job.
What a great human being he is
that he just makes sure that he's a good friend first.
[Feliks] I think if I won Worlds this year, that would be pretty epic.
translation.zh:
‎如果我赢了今年的世界锦标赛
‎那就太好了

translation.en: And to win it in, like, Melbourne where, you know, I've grown up,
translation.zh: ‎在我从小长大的墨尔本拿冠军

translation.en: that would just... that would complete everything.
I moved to Sydney in February this year.
translation.zh: ‎今年二月 我搬到了悉尼

translation.en: I, like, did an internship with this trading firm.
But I have no idea of what I want to do for a career
translation.zh: ‎但我还没想好要做什么 ‎从事什么职业 下半生要做什么

translation.en: or, like, the rest of my life.
translation.zh: ‎从事什么职业 下半生要做什么

translation.en: Cubing is, like, the thing that I'm really, really passionate about,
so I want to keep that a big part of my life.
translation.zh: ‎所以我想继续将它作为生活的重心

translation.en: [Schwan] I know in cubing, people start to slide down the rankings
translation.zh: ‎我知道 人们在接近成年时

translation.en: about the time that they would normally enter adulthood.
Because life happens.
You have to pay rent, you have to find a partner,
translation.zh: ‎你得支付房租 你得寻找人生伴侣

translation.en: you have to buy ketchup.
I mean, there's all these things that you have to make happen.
You just can't cube as much.
-[upbeat music playing] -[people chattering]
Which event have you prepared the most for?
3x3 is always the most exciting.
It's the Rubik's Cube. It's the original cube.
translation.zh: ‎这才是魔方 最初的魔方

translation.en: You can lose everything else, do really terribly,
translation.zh: ‎即使别的项目全部输掉 成绩糟透了

translation.en: but if you win 3x3, it's great, it's all that matters.
translation.zh: ‎只要赢了3x3就行了 ‎这才是最重要的

translation.en: [man] Is Max, like, the best cuber in the world?
translation.zh:
‎马克斯是全世界
‎最优秀的魔方选手吗？

translation.en: Max is the king.
2016, it's like, "Oh, there's this kid and he's quite fast."
translation.zh:
‎2016年你会说
‎“哦 这个孩子速度挺快的”

translation.en: 2017, it's like, "Oh, you won the world championships."
translation.zh:
‎2017年你会说
‎“哦 你赢了世界锦标赛”

translation.en: And then 2018, it's like, "Oh, now he holds every world record."
translation.zh:
‎2018年你会说
‎“惨了 他包揽了所有世界纪录”

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Yeah.
He's just the best at everything.
Okay, Max. Go in.
translation.zh: ‎好了 马克斯 上车吧

translation.en: [Schwan] All right Max, let's go. Let's meet Feliks.
translation.zh:
‎好了 马克斯 走吧
‎我们去见菲利克斯

translation.en: [Miki] Be careful, okay? It's slippery.
Oh, look who it is! Hey, Max.
[Max] I missed you.
I missed you too a lot. How's it going?
translation.zh: ‎我也很想你 最近怎么样？

translation.en: Hi! Nice to see you!
-Hey, Jason, what's going on? -Hi, what's up?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 杰森 最近还好吧？
‎-嗨 你好

translation.en: -Feliks, how are you? -Good evening.
Welcome to dinner.
[Max] Congrats, Feliks.
Congratulations, Feliks, on your world record average, 5.69.
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯 恭喜你创造了
‎平均世界纪录 5.69秒

translation.en: Thank you, Max. It's good, right? When are you gonna beat it?
translation.zh:
‎谢了 马克斯 ‎这成绩还不错吧？
‎你打算何时打破它？

translation.en: Vegetables, Max.
[Max] Oh, sure.
[Feliks] Yes, and green.
-Green. Yeah. -Yep.
[Schwan] One, two, three. One more. One, two, three. Good.
translation.zh: ‎一二三 ‎再来一张 一二三 很好

translation.en: All right.
[David] Well, these days, I think a lot of people would say
that Max is what we would call the favorite.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯是最热门的夺冠人选

translation.en: But when Feliks won the US Nationals last year against Max,
translation.zh:
‎但去年菲利克斯战胜了马克斯
‎夺得了全美锦标赛冠军

translation.en: I thought, "Hang on. It could be whatever happens on the day."
translation.zh:
‎我就想 “且慢
‎比赛那天什么情况都有可能发生”

translation.en: In looking at the competition between the two of them
coming up to the current world championships,
who knows?
-[Schwan] Max, time to get up. -[Max grunts]
translation.zh: ‎马克里 该起床了 ‎（世界锦标赛当天早上）

translation.en: [woman] Three, two...
My teeth is hurting right now.
[announcer] Thank you all for coming to the WCA World Championships 2019.
translation.zh:
‎欢迎来到2019年
‎世界魔方协会世界锦标赛

translation.en: So, next up, we have the biggest of the biggest.
-[man 1] We've got Max Park. -[man 2] Look who's next to him.
translation.zh:
‎-马克斯·帕克上场了
‎-看看他旁边的人是谁

translation.en: [man 2] First solve by Feliks.
-[man 1] Not ideal for him. -[man 2] No, definitely not.
translation.zh:
‎-对他来说不算理想
‎-对 绝对不理想

translation.en: -[man 1] Holy guacamole. -[man 2] Holy guacamole.
That is a ridiculously good start.
[man 3] Feliks is at... 1.30 right now. He's not even in podium.
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯的成绩是…1.30
‎连前三名都没进

translation.en: One-seventeen!
[man 1] Feliks is like, "Okay, Max."
translation.zh: ‎菲利克斯似乎在说：”好吧 马克斯“

translation.en: Wow!
[Miki] Oh, my gosh, it's a world record!
[man 1] Jeepers creepers!
I can't believe it.
[man 1] Is Feliks nervous, or are his hands cold?
[man 2] He's really pissed.
Hell yeah.
Max is like, "Just get out. This is my competition."
translation.zh:
‎马克斯似乎在说：
‎“都出去吧 这是我的比赛”

translation.en: -Feliks going for his third now. -Oh no.
translation.zh:
‎-菲利克斯开始第三次
‎-噢 不

translation.en: You don't want to see that.
-[man 2] Nineteen-oh-eight! -[man 1] Another 18!
Max Park showing who's boss.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯·帕克在证明谁是老大

translation.en: [man 2] That is five world championships for Max Park so far.
translation.zh:
‎目前为止 马克斯·帕克
‎已经赢了世界锦标赛的五个项目

translation.en: Okay. Okay, everybody, one, two, three. Look up here, Bill!
translation.zh:
‎好 ‎好 大家注意
‎ 一、二、三 看这里 比尔！

translation.en: One, two, three, smile. Come on, Bill.
translation.zh:
‎一、二、三 微笑  ‎-别闹了 比尔
‎-再来一张

translation.en: [competitor] One more.
-[Miki] Oh, one more? -[man] One more.
All right, we're gonna go, folks.
translation.zh: ‎让我看看 谁第一个上场？

translation.en: All right, Juliette, you can come up.
translation.zh: ‎好 朱丽叶 该你上场了

translation.en: [announcer] The first female 3x3 finalist in the world championship since 2003,
translation.zh:
‎2003年以来 世界锦标赛3x3项目的
‎首位女性决赛选手

translation.en: please welcome France's Juliette Sébastien.
translation.zh: ‎有请来自法国的朱丽叶·塞巴斯蒂安

translation.en: -[applause, cheering] -[fanfare playing]
[man 1] Juliette Sébastien looking at yellow right now, switching--
translation.zh: ‎朱丽叶·塞巴斯蒂安看着黄色 切换…

translation.en: -The cube dropped! -She knows she could have got faster.
translation.zh: ‎魔方掉了！ ‎她知道她可以更快的

translation.en: [man 1] Oh, my god. There are no pauses, straight into pink.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 毫无停顿 直接进入粉色

translation.en: Yellow, J Perm, 6.29!
[man 2] He'll be really happy with that. Nod of the head.
translation.zh: ‎他点着头 对这个成绩很满意

translation.en: [man 1] And that's a pause. Oh, six!
[man 2] He did it. He's taken the lead!
I'm speechless.
-[man 2] Aw, the hug from Kian to Sean. -[man 1] That's great sportsmanship.
translation.zh:
‎-奇恩给了肖恩一个拥抱
‎-这是很好的体育精神

translation.en: [man 2] Sean's probably on his way to, if not a podium,
translation.zh: ‎肖恩有可能夺得…就算不是前三名

translation.en: at least a top-five finish.
[man 1] Remember, he's trying to beat a 6.78 average by Sean.
translation.zh:
‎记住 他要争取超过
‎肖恩的6.78秒的平均成绩

translation.en: -It's looking good. -[man 2] Now, that's a good solid 5.97.
[announcer] Five-point-nine-seven.
[man 1] Best case scenario is 6.49 average, which would put him ahead of Sean.
translation.zh:
‎最好的情况是平均6.49秒
‎那样就能超过肖恩

translation.en: [man 2] Let's see what he can do. This is gonna be really, really important,
translation.zh: ‎让我们看看他的本事 ‎这一次无比重要

translation.en: so don't blink, stay tuned, hold your breath.
translation.zh: ‎所以别眨眼、别走开 屏住呼吸

translation.en: [man 1] It's looking good.
[man 2] He's still looking good. No chokes, no chokes.
translation.zh: ‎他仍然表现不错 没有出错

translation.en: [man 1] What a-- What a solve!
Oh, my god, he just slotted himself into first right now!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 他抢到了第一名的位置！

translation.en: [man 2] Six-seventy-four, that is first place right now.
-That guarantees Philipp for the podium. -[man 1] Guaranteed podium for Philipp.
translation.zh:
‎-菲利普铁定能站上领奖台
‎-飞利浦铁定能领奖了

translation.en: [man 2] Very impressive.
[man 2] Next up is gonna be the local hero, our favorite, Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.zh:
‎接下来上场的是本土英雄
‎我们最看好的菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯

translation.en: [announcer] Our sixth place seed has won Worlds twice in 2013 and 2015.
translation.zh:
‎我们排名第六的种子选手
‎曾在2013和2015年两次夺冠

translation.en: Please welcome Australia's Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.zh:
‎有请来自澳大利亚的
‎菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯

translation.en: [man 1] This is what we want. Yeah!
translation.zh: ‎这才是我们想看到的 对！

translation.en: Yeah, Australians standing up.
Applauding him.
[man 1] I imagine Feliks is gonna have a fair bit of pressure.
translation.zh: ‎我想菲利克斯会有不小的压力

translation.en: He's only gotten one podium this weekend and this would be the first Worlds
translation.zh:
‎这个周末他只上过一次领奖台
‎如果这场比赛不能夺冠

translation.en: where he isn't a world champion if he doesn't take it home here.
translation.zh:
‎那将是他首次
‎在世界锦标赛上未能夺冠

translation.en: So you could say there's a lot on the line for that reason.
translation.zh: ‎因此 可以说他是背水一战

translation.en: [man 2] But then again,
if anybody can do well under pressure, it's Feliks.
translation.zh:
‎要说有人能顶着压力取得好成绩
‎那肯定是菲利克斯

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, he is still the greatest of all time, regardless.
translation.zh:
‎对 无论如何
‎他仍然是世上最伟大的选手

translation.en: No lockups thus far. At least no big ones.
translation.zh: ‎目前还没有卡顿 至少没有大的停顿

translation.en: -Looks like... Okay. -Good. Six and four. A perm.
translation.zh:
‎-看样子…好吧
‎-很好 六和四 A置换

translation.en: -Plus two. -Oh no.
[announcer] Feliks with a 9.60.
[man 2] Two second time penalty, 'cause that cube is not solved completely.
translation.zh: ‎加罚两秒 因为魔方没有完全解开

translation.en: [man 1] Over 45 degrees off with a 90 degree off, one turn off.
translation.zh: ‎超过45度 加上90度 外加一圈

translation.en: That's gonna put the pressure on.
[man 2] Now we'll see what Feliks is made of.
translation.zh: ‎菲利克斯见真章的时候到了

translation.en: [man 1] Yeah, nerves of steel or...
translation.zh: ‎对 到底是钢铁意志 还是…

translation.en: Or is it game over?
-[man 2] Rats. -Okay, that's not a good start.
And that's gonna be diag.
[man 2] E perm.
Six-sixty-one, though. I mean, for those cases, for that solve--
translation.zh:
‎6.61 我是说
‎就这种情况和这种解法而言

translation.en: It was not an easy solve and he still got a 6.6.
translation.zh:
‎这种解法不容易
‎但他仍然取得了6.6秒的成绩

translation.en: -[man 1] But he's not gonna win. -That's not enough.
[man 1] Guaranteed no world champion titles for Feliks Zemdegs.
translation.zh:
‎菲利克斯·曾姆丹格斯
‎肯定与世界冠军无缘了

translation.en: First time this has happened since 2011.
We are officially in a new era of cubing.
translation.zh: ‎我们正式进入了魔方的新纪元

translation.en: [man 2] I think it's almost safe to say he will not be on the podium this year.
translation.zh:
‎几乎可以肯定
‎他今年无缘站上领奖台了

translation.en: [referee] Twelve seconds.
[man 2] There he goes, with blue. He chose to start on blue.
translation.zh: ‎他开始了 蓝色 ‎他选择从蓝色开始

translation.en: -[man 1] Okay, this is-- -This is gonna be good.
[man 1] Slight lockups, but...
[announcer] Feliks with a 6.45.
...secures his current third place,
translation.zh: ‎巩固了他目前第三名的位置

translation.en: but he's got to get through really good competitors
translation.zh: ‎不过 后面还有很厉害的选手

translation.en: if he wants to keep the podium.
-Could've been worse. -It's not too bad.
[Miki] I'm so proud of you.
No matter what happens, it doesn't matter, okay?
translation.zh: ‎无论发生什么事 都不要紧 好吗？

translation.en: -All right. -[stage tech] Okay, guys.
Okay, go, Max. Go, go!
-You can do it. -Okay, Max.
You can do it.
[Max] I don't need to get podium.
I'm just gonna get sub-six average, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我只想平均成绩低于六秒 好吗？

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah, and I know you're gonna get lots and lots of...
translation.zh: ‎好 我知道你一定会创造很多…

translation.en: [Max] I can get a sub... I can get a sub-six average, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我能做到低于…
‎我能做到平均成绩低于六秒

translation.en: I don't need to get podium...
[Miki] Max, when you compete with who?
translation.zh: ‎马克斯 当你和谁较量的时候？

translation.en: Feliks Zemdegs.
You're gonna get lots of?
[Max] World records.
[Miki] Yeah! You did it already, right?
translation.zh: ‎对啊 你已经做到了 对吧？

translation.en: So don't worry! Just have--
-[Max] I got this! -Go for it, yeah.
[Max] I can do it, sub-six average, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我能行 低于六秒 好吗？

translation.en: [Miki] Yes.
[man 1] And now, the GOAT.
[announcer] Our number one seed...
-[Max] Sub-six average. -...the defending world champion.
translation.zh:
‎-平均低于六秒
‎-…卫冕世界冠军

translation.en: Please welcome from the United States, Max Park.
translation.zh: ‎有请来自美国的马克斯·帕克

translation.en: [man 1] Park, defending world champion. Max Park from the United States.
translation.zh:
‎卫冕世界冠军帕克
‎马克斯·帕克来自美国

translation.en: Will he be the first person to win six events at a world championship?
translation.zh:
‎他会成为在世界锦标赛上
‎赢得六个项目的第一人吗？

translation.en: -[man 1] So he's already-- -Previous record of five.
translation.zh:
‎-所以他已经…
‎-之前的纪录是五个项目

translation.en: [man 1] So, he's already won the 4x4, the 5x5, the 6x6, the 7x7, and one-handed events.
translation.zh:
‎他已经赢得了4x4、5x5、6x6、7x7
‎以及单手项目

translation.en: Insane!
Now, don't blink, it's Max Park time.
translation.zh:
‎现在 不要眨眼
‎这是马克斯·帕克时间

translation.en: And he's off. He chose the yellow cross. One pair, two pair, three pair, four pair.
translation.zh:
‎他开始了 他选择了黄色十字
‎一个组合 两个、三个、四个组合

translation.en: -OLL. -[man 2] Ah, V perm.
[man 1] Oh, that is not very good.
[announcer] Max with a 7.70.
Where's Phil? Where's Phil?
[ref] Eight-point-five.
[man 1] Max is in a bit of danger here. It's really up in the air.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯有危险了 真的很难预料

translation.en: Philipp could be world champion.
-Clean. Looking good. -[man 2] That is good. That is good.
[announcer] Max with a 6.42.
[man 1] Yup, Max is bringing it back big time.
His counting is a 6.57 going into the last two.
translation.zh:
‎他目前的成绩是6.57
‎还有最后两次

translation.en: A lot on the line, especially for Max Park.
translation.zh:
‎这是关键时刻
‎尤其对于马克斯·帕克

translation.en: [man 2] Nothing's decided yet. It will all depend on the last solve.
translation.zh: ‎胜负未见分晓 一切取决于最后一次

translation.en: This is going to decide if Max Park is the world champion
translation.zh:
‎这将决定
‎是马克斯·帕克成为世界冠军

translation.en: or if Philipp Weyer gets the upset.
[Feliks] What does he need? Robin, what does he need?
translation.zh:
‎他需要进入几秒？
‎罗宾 他需要进入几秒？

translation.en: -[Robin] Like a 6.7, I think. -[Feliks] What does he need?
[Robin] 6.7?
[man 1] Dude, this is so huge. This is literally everything right now.
translation.zh: ‎真是太紧张了 一切就看这一下了

translation.en: Will he get back to back GOAT status?
translation.zh: ‎是他重夺世上最佳选手的地位

translation.en: Or will it be Philipp?
[competitor 1] Guys, make space for Philipp to run.
translation.zh: ‎大家让让 让菲利普跑向领奖台

translation.en: No, don't. Max is a boss.
Like, come on. I know he's gonna get this. I'd be expecting a six.
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我知道他一定能行 ‎我预计是六秒

translation.en: [man 1] Seven flat? Seven flat!
-[man 2] Philipp did it! -[man 1] Philipp did it!
translation.zh:
‎-菲利普成功了！
‎-菲利普成功了！

translation.en: Philipp is the new world champion.
Wow.
[man 1] I don't think anyone would've predicted this podium, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎我想谁都没料到前三名会是他们

translation.en: [Miki] Okay, Max, let's go out.
translation.zh: ‎好了 马克斯 我们出去吧

translation.en: [Max] I didn't inspect well, right?
[Miki] Yeah, it's okay, Max. You know, everybody makes mistakes.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 马克斯 每个人都会犯错

translation.en: [Max] Yeah.
[Miki] This is a good learning, okay?
translation.zh: ‎这是一个很好的教训 好吗？

translation.en: -[Max] Okay. -You can do it next time.
Here you go.
[Feliks] I tried, I tried.
So close.
-[Feliks] You did good. You did fine. -[Miki] Yeah.
-[Miki] Okay. -You destroyed everyone.
It's okay.
-Yeah, it's okay. -It makes us stronger.
translation.zh:
‎-对 没事
‎-失败让我们更强大

translation.en: [Miki] Yeah, it makes us stronger, okay?
-Exactly. You still beat me. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-没错 你还是战胜了我
‎-对

translation.en: [Max] "No podium" makes us stronger, right?
translation.zh: ‎没有得奖让我们更强大 对吧？

translation.en: Exactly.
[Feliks] The thing that me and Max always say is,
"If you mess something up, it makes you stronger."
translation.zh: ‎“一件事没有做好 这会让你更强大”

translation.en: So I think that was what he was saying. "No podium" makes him stronger.
translation.zh:
‎他说“没有得奖让我们更强大”
‎我想就是这个意思

translation.en: And then I still told him, he still beat me by 0.01 seconds.
translation.zh:
‎然后我还是跟他说
‎他比我快了0.01秒

translation.en: But yeah, I could tell he was like pretty bummed that he didn't win the 3x3.
translation.zh:
‎但我看得出来 他很郁闷
‎因为没有赢得3x3

translation.en: [Max] It's okay, right?
-[Max] It's okay. -Right. It's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-没关系 对吧？
‎-对 ‎-没关系
‎-没事的

translation.en: Dude, you're five time... five world championships. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 你拿了五项…五项第一名

translation.en: It's okay.
-You won everything. -[man] Yeah, you did great.
translation.zh:
‎-你赢了很多奖
‎-是啊 你很出色

translation.en: Yeah.
It's a hard thing:
Max just dominating the entire competition,
but then missing out on the big one.
And yeah, I've been in that situation, so I know how...
translation.zh: ‎我也有过这种经历 所以我明白…

translation.en: I know how he must feel at the moment as well.
Dang, Feliks didn't get podium.
translation.zh: ‎真可惜 菲利克斯没有拿到奖

translation.en: -Dang it, right? -Yeah.
But he did okay average, right?
translation.zh: ‎不过他的平均成绩还不错 对吧？

translation.en: Right, yeah.
[voice growing emotional] Max looked at Feliks in the backstage,
translation.zh: ‎马克斯在后台看着菲利克斯

translation.en: and I could-- I know Max. He was looking at Feliks.
translation.zh:
‎我可以…我了解马克斯
‎他看着菲利克斯

translation.en: Feliks didn't make a lot of things,
and he was really feeling sorry for him.
I knew that Max didn't know how to say the words, but...
translation.zh:
‎我知道麦克斯不懂用语言表达
‎但是…

translation.en: lot of things he wanted to say.
So I felt like, ah...
friendship.
But Max cannot express.
So I wanted to talk about that to Feliks in person.
translation.zh: ‎所以我想亲自跟菲利克斯聊聊

translation.en: Let him know that Max really loves him.
translation.zh: ‎让他知道马克斯真的很爱他

translation.en: [Feliks] Max! You gotta go!
Out of his way.
Out of the way, Kieran. Go, go, go!
[Feliks] Nerves at world championships are very much real.
translation.zh: ‎参加世界锦标赛真的让人很紧张

translation.en: It's pretty draining,
for, you know, four days to try and be solving
translation.zh: ‎因为…连着四天 ‎要解魔方 跟所有人叙旧

translation.en: while catching up with everyone, not sleeping much.
translation.zh: ‎要解魔方 跟所有人叙旧 ‎睡得很少

translation.en: For me, like, you know, not doing especially well this competition
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 这次比赛成绩不佳

translation.en: also adds to that exhaustion.
It was a big letdown for me.
[interviewer] Any last thoughts about this Worlds in general?
translation.zh: ‎对于这次锦标赛 还有什么想法吗？

translation.en: [voice growing emotional] I started out so long ago,
solving cubes with a couple of people here in Melbourne,
translation.zh: ‎跟墨尔本的一些人一起解魔方

translation.en: meeting up and having these fun little competitions.
And to know that like...
you know, they would hold the world championships here...
and so many friends from all around the world
and family and my friends from Melbourne here
translation.zh: ‎还有墨尔本当地的家人和朋友

translation.en: could come along and enjoy this...
it's very, very special. Very special. It's pretty sad that it's over.
translation.zh: ‎对我有特别的意义 非常特别 ‎比赛结束了让我很难过

translation.en: [Schwan] The biggest fear that I've always had was how Max was going to deal with loss.
translation.zh:
‎一直以来 最让我担心的是
‎马克斯对于失败的承受能力

translation.en: And so when he lost,
it almost felt like, "Okay, the time has come.
translation.zh: ‎我的感觉是“好吧 这一刻已经来了

translation.en: Now time to get to work."
The big win for us is that Max, he did okay emotionally.
translation.zh:
‎对我们来说 最大的胜利是
‎马克斯的情绪控制得很好

translation.en: [Miki] He managed his nervousness and made new friends.
translation.zh:
‎他控制住紧张情绪
‎结交了一些新朋友

translation.en: He told me that it's okay.
"It's okay. Mama, I didn't cry."
translation.zh: ‎“没关系 ‎妈妈 我没有哭” 所以…

translation.en: So... that's winning for us.
Podium. You get a podium.
[Schwan] I don't think Feliks knows how big of an impact he has on Max's life.
translation.zh:
‎我想菲利克斯并不清楚
‎他对马克斯的生活有多大的影响

translation.en: [Schwan] Without a doubt, Feliks is going to be Max's hero forever.
translation.zh:
‎毫无疑问 菲利克斯
‎永远是马克斯心目中的英雄

translation.en: [Max] Boom, baby!
